full.title: Functional mockup unit
full.description: Defines a functional mockup unit (.fmu). By default, all the fmu variables are activated.

full.title: Global settings for the simulation working mode.
full.description: Global settings for the simulation working mode.

time-source.description:
Time source for the simulation. Operate without hardware and simulate all buses completely. 
If this property is set, "default-network-mapping" is also required. 
"internal-realtime": The time response of the measurement (time basis) is controlled internally. 
"internal-scaled": The simulation speed is provided through the property "time-scaling-factor". 
"external-software": The time response of the measurement (time basis) is controlled by an external program. 
The property "time-scaling-factor" is mandatory if "time-source" is set to "internal-scaled" and is forbidden otherwise.

full.description: Name of a .blf file, supporting the field codes: {ComputerName}, {LocalTime}, {MeasurementIndex}, {MeasurementStart}, {IncSize|001|100MB}, {IncTime|001|01h00m}, {IncTrigger|001}, {TriggerCondition} and {IncTrigger|001}_{TriggerCondition}
Absolute or relative path to a SIL Kit config file (.yaml/.json). Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the configuration file.

full.title: User files
full.description: Describes a user file that can be read/written by CAPL/.NET scripts.

file-path.description: Absolute or relative path to a user file. Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the configuration file.

inactive-model-variables.description: List of the FMU variables which should be excluded from the export

full.title: Logging Block
full.description: Configuration of the standalone logging block.

full.title: Include files
full.description: Include a different file (similar to #include of the c preprocessor). The order of includes does not matter. Circular / multiple includes are resolved correctly.

full.title: Datasources
full.description: Defines datasources used by the application models (.vcdl/.vcodm).
Advanced logging configurations.

warn-overwritten-log-file.description: Specifies whether a warning is shown at the start of measurement before overwriting an existing logging file.

show-error-on-data-loss.description: Specifies whether an error is shown after the measurement if data loss occurred during the measurement. Lines in the logging file marked with a * as a special symbol have corrupted lines around them.

full.description: Test trigger settings. The execution period of test elements controls the start and stop of logging.

scope.description: Scope of the test trigger, for each a logging file is created.

verdict.description: List of test verdicts for which logging files will remain stored.

pre-trigger-time-ms.description: Time before triggering that should also be logged.

post-trigger-time-ms.description: Time after the triggered stopped that should also be logged.

buffer-size.description: Event buffer size for events pre-trigger-time-ms

full.title: System variables
full.description: Describes a system variable file (.vsysvar/.xml).

full.title: System variables
full.description: Absolute or relative path to an external file containing system variables. Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the defining configuration file.

full.title: User files
full.description: Absolute or relative path to user files that can be read/written by CAPL/.NET Scripts. Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the defining configuration file.

Absolute or relative path to a source file of a functional mockup unit (.fmu). Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the defining configuration file.
Absolute or relative path to a datasource file (.vcdl/.vcodm). Relative path specifications are resolved relative to the configuration file.
